mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment( username, content_id, nickname, comment, time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{content_id}, #{nickname}, #{comment}, #{time} )
mapper.select: create table IF NOT EXISTS tbl_comment ( c_seq bigint auto_increment primary key, content_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, username varchar(30) not null, nickname varchar(10) not null, comment VARCHAR(125) not null, time varchar(20) not null )
